Text: Raffles Place MRT Station:  It is one of the more prominent and busier stations within Singapore's transport system, especially being an interchange station located within the Central Area.

Text: Raffles Place MRT Station:  The station has a large number of entrances/exits, the two main ones facing the Raffles Gardens, with the building being a miniature facade of the historic John Little building.
